DOC.detailed_description: PROMPT ( Prospective Registry Multiplex Testing ) Internet-based , patient-directed ascertainment study . It partnership Memorial Sloan Kettering , University Pennsylvania , Mayo Clinic , Dana Farber Cancer Institute collaboration Ambry Genetics , GeneDx , Myriad Genetics , Pathway Genomics , Quest Laboratories ( 5 laboratory provide multiplex panel test commercially ) .
DOC.criteria: Individual deleterious ( pathogenic ) likely deleterious ( likely pathogenic ) mutation cancer susceptibility gene OR Individual variant uncertain significance ( VUS ) cancer susceptibility gene OR Untested member family know transmit deleterious likely deleterious mutation variant uncertain significance cancer predisposition gene Inability refusal participate consent discussion Subject le 18 year old
